page.title: 18FAMILY LIFE IN ILMINGTON
page.content: {A day in the life of a businessman} I have a family of a wife, four children under ten years old and a dog.I have three companies in Bidford-on-Avon, Birmingham and Bracknell(Berkshire) for which I am totally responsible.I work a 65 hour week, approximately. {7.30am}wake and shower. {8.00am}breakfast with family.This is the only daily meal each week when the whole family is together. {9.00am}drive to Birmingham. {9.40am}arrive, drink tea then begin work.I sometimes lunch out with customers, or else I work without a break until 7.00pm. {7.00pm}drive home. listening to the "Archers", using the dictaphone. {7.45pm}arrive home (although it can be 1.00am).{8.30pm}dinner.{10.30pm}bed.
